verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מִיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim time רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, And it came to pass a long אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> 'A-cha-rei after אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after הֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> he-Ni-ach had given rest יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Hem from all their enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv; round about וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' that Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> za-Ken, aged בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim. in age

וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem and you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem, And ye have seen אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah hath done יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim unto all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Chem; because כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of you for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who הַנִּלְחָ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> han-nil-Cham [is] he that hath fought לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

לְבִלְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-ti- so בוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> Vo That ye come בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim not among these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim these that remain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; among וּבְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> u-ve-Shem of the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem of their gods לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- or תַזְכִּ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> taz-Ki-ru among you neither make mention וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or תַשְׁבִּ֔יעוּ <S%H7650><s%> tash-Bi-'u, nor cause to swear וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not תַעַבְד֔וּם <S%H5647><s%> ta-'av-Dum, [by them] neither serve וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or תִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> tish-ta-cha-Vu them nor bow לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.
